name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 1.時變電磁場之介紹;2.平面電磁波;3.傳輸線之理論及應用;4.導波管與共振腔;5.天線與輻射系統。
description.en: 1.Introduction to Time-Varying Fields;2.Plane Electromagnetic Waves;3.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines;4.Waveguides and Resonators;5.Antennas and Radiating Systems.

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1.簡介2.信號與系統3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變7.數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot.  The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics:1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications,2. robot motion ,analysis and control3.  robot end effectors4. robot cell design and control 5. assembly and inspectionsafety, training ,maintenance, and quality

notes: 工管大三大四與工管所合開

description.zh: 本課程提供學生學習下列技術:低成本自動化，應用於自動化之元件與設備的認識，氣壓控制技術，可程式控制器，生產線機器連線整合控制實務，自動化生產技術。
description.en: This course provides students with the following technologies: low cost automation components, pneumatic control, programmable logic controller, the practical control of integrated production line, and automation production technology.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,gametheory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

name.zh: VR與AR於工作環境設計概論
name.en: ntroduction of VR/AR in workspace and its design

description.zh: 此概論課程將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境相關技術於工作環境及其設計之應用。課程中將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境於不同工作環境及其設計之應用實例，旨在使學生了解如何將虛擬實境及擴增實境之技術運用在實際工作環境、產品及系統設計。
description.en: The introductory course gives an overview about VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented) technology applied in different workspace and its designs. Various applications and examples of VR and AR applied in workspace design will be demonstrated. The goal of the course is to empower students in learning VR/AR applications and how to apply the techniques in actual work environments, product development and system designs..

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹生產排程的基本理論與方法，使學生奠定排程研究與排程實務問題解決的基礎。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the basic concept on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects.

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 包括應用力學與材料力學兩大部份。課程介紹應力概念、應力與應變、軸向與平面、扭轉、彎曲、樑的撓度、柱、能量方法等。
description.en: Topics covered in design kinematics and Materials phase include: Engineering Mechanics Dynamics, Motion, Vibration, Material Forming Process, Tension, Compression, Shear, Torsion, Bending, Beam, Buckling and Stability.Also included with in this category are the activities as sociated with the preparation of the preliminary brief and the conceptualisation of the problem sloution. The management category emphasises the inevstigation and interpretation of both management functions and principles.

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

description.zh: 講解新產品開發流程的企畫、設計、製造等知識，並演練運用解決複雜的產品設計開發問題之系統化設計方法、快速手繪以及立體電腦模型表現，延續並運用大一與大二課程所學之美學、人因工程、工學、電腦繪圖等各方面知識與技能。
description.en: Course projects are chosen to give students an opportunity to use their creative, technical and theoretical skills in a business application. The primary emphasis is on the use of a systematic process for the design and development of products.

description.zh: 整合室內設計基礎課程，如：基礎室內設計原理、基礎圖學、施工圖、手繪透視表現、電腦3D表現、建築構造學、室內建築學、裝飾材料、景觀與室內園藝等課程，以創意激發的訓練為主，透過實際設計程序的演練，習得設計的方法並培養解決問題的能力。
description.en: Integration of the interior design foundation courses, such as: basic interior design principles, basic drawings, work drawings, hand-drew perspective, computer 3D performance, building construction, interior architecture, decoration materials, landscape and indoor gardening etc. The course aims to stimulate creativity and to develop problem-solving abilities through the practices of proper design methods and the actual design process.

description.zh: 照明設計基本原理之介紹為'照明設計'之基礎先修課程.以期學生能獲得照明設計之正確觀點與知識,內容含燈具與光源之關係,光的材料特性與色彩,測光法與光源資料之解釋,以及照明對人生生理與心理上的影響.
description.en: Course Title:Design of Lighting Description:This course is designed for one-semester program in the lighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce the softwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lightion equipements. lighting design, transmission system, and distribution system) and how to maintain these equipments.

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 實際演練室內設計工程中由生活需求分析及調查,規劃設立,施工,協調,管理等各種活動.並綜合性掌握環境中各種條件以習得室內設計的手法.
description.en: The Course is divided into five units: 1). The Nineteenth Century: The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring", and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unle

description.zh: 速寫是最古老、最容易、最快速的溝通方式之一，也是充滿希望的設計師及藝術家必備的絕技。藉由大量的植物寫生，提昇觀察能力並把線條練活，進而建立起掌控「形」的基本信心。接下來的靜物寫生著重整體的構圖關係，利用黑白灰的構圖原理，著眼在傳其「神」而不是傳其「形」。將前階段的單線練習，改作分塊、分面的線群練習。再接下來是人物肖像寫生練習。到此，線條的特質、比例的嚴謹皆要掌控，肖像對象的性別、年齡、特徵以及由內在而外顯的神韻，是畫者所要表達的。
description.en: Sketching is one of the oldest, easiest and quickest methods of communication and also one of the most important skills a hopeful designer and artist must master. The course begins with a lot of plants sketching that helps to enhance your observation and build up your confidence in mastering forms and shapes in order to make your sketches vivid. Next still life sketching focuses on the composition. You are encouraged to utilize the composition principle of black, white and gray, and emphasize more on the vividness than the form until you get rid of the habit of passive copying of the objects. Then you move from the previous linear sketching practice into facet sketching and then block sketching. At the end of the semester, you will practice human portrait sketching. Until now you should be able to handle not only the characteristics of the line and proportion, but also the gender, age, charm and expression of the model.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年課程視為建築設計之基礎課題，從建築美學之觀點培養基本素養、建築模樣體驗、設計實作再造，達到建築設計基本知識之體態。並結合一年級橫向課程之實作、圖學、設計理論、全能住宅改造等課程，課程規劃以多元建構為主，其養成要點如下:1. 美學再創造：基本美學素養養成，將感知中的聽覺、視覺、觸覺等與美學體驗再度結合，用思考轉換形式。奠定日後進入空間美學基礎。2. 建築繪圖與表現技巧：建築相關圖學與識圖展現養成，體驗空間感受與空間掌握，美學與繪圖思考整合。3. 空間構成與思維邏輯：將2D轉為3D，藉由點、線、面、體之基本元素，將環境觀察或是感知等邏輯分析，呈現空間的比例、尺度或透過實作技術等理論，重構思維進一步與環境共構將空間再塑。4. 設計實務養成：為因應環境友善，與環境共存之議題如何運用在設計之中，探討行為模式、機能、線安排空間組織等等，將環境之感受能力，以空間再改造展現能力，由於重於綠材料之實作特色，因此實作養成之重要關鍵之一，需配合全能改造課程。達到創作性實務，可說是實驗性實作的特色課程。5.材料與構築實驗：體驗材料之特性，將材料之特性發揮到極限。
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. The course as the fundamental of architectural design aims to foster basic knowledge from the perspective of architectural aesthetics, experience, and design execution. Combined with the lateral curriculum of construction, drawing, design theory, and housing renewal projects, the program built upon diversified exposures in 1. aesthetics, 2. architectural drawings and rendering techniques, 3. spatial constructs and logics, 4.  Professional training, 5.  materials and experiments, 6. communication and presentation.Studio introduction to architect

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the first step of a series course, its content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System2. Air Conditional Equipment System  3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System4. Electric equipment5. Facility Management6. Renewal of Equipment System

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:1.	theories in relation to site planning;2.	design sequences of site planning;3.	investigations and analyses of the sites;4.	planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.	environmental impact assessment;6.cases studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en: 1. Graphic standards for working drawing. 2. Drawing preparation and process. 3. Selected shop drawing

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生了解各結構系統的架構及概念，與其受地震力、風力之行為。1.作用於建築物之荷重、2.結構材料性質與結構需求、3.基本應力、4.受張及受壓結構、5.桁架結構、6.樑及構架系統、7.格子樑、平版及摺板系統、8.薄膜結構、9.薄殼結構
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the concepts and behaviors of each kind of structural systems. 1.Loads on Structures, 2.Structural Materials and Structural Requirements, 3.Fundamental Stress, 4.Tension and Compression Structures, 5.Truss Systems, 6.Beam and Rigid Frames, 7.Grid, Slab and Folded-Plate, 8.Membrane Structures, 9.Thin Shells

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

description.zh: 本課程講授並實際演練針對建築設計領域中的先端數位實務技術，以增進學習者的設計操作能力及表現力。
description.en: This course offers students hands-on exercises on various advanced digital practices that have become essential in the architectural design discipline, intending to prepare students properly their ability to execute these techniques.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System.

description.zh: 先修課程:物理或負責教授同意不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introductionto Compressible Flow.

description.zh: 車輛電機實驗內容包括：(1)發電機、電動機與電瓶實驗；(2)二極體、電晶體與運算放大器實驗；(3)電源轉換器與電動機驅動器實驗。學生將學習車輛電機的基本要求，並練習如何應用適當工具設計與製作電路，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental vehicle electrical requirements, and utilizing tools to design and implement the electric circuits. Topics include: (1) Generators, motors, and batteries experiments, (2) Diodes, transistors and operational amplifiers experiments, and (3) Source converters and motor drivers experiments.

description.zh: 車輛底盤與結構實驗內容包括: (1)車輛底盤分析與實驗；(2)車輛噪音分析與實驗；(3)車輛結構分析與實驗。學生將學習車輛設計的基本要求，並練習如何應用適當工具求得車底盤與結構系統主要性能，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental vehicle design requirements and utilizing tools to obtain the major characteristics and performance of the vehicle. Topics include: (1) Vehicle Chassis System Measurements, (2) Vehicle Sound Quality Measurements, (3) Vehicle Structure Analyses and Measurements.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始、邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of Boundary-ValueProblems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 字彙, 文法, 閱讀, 解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其設計，內容涵蓋如下：冷凍工程原理，冷凍系統之設備，各種冷凍系統之設計，冷凍負荷計算，冷媒管路之設計與計算，冷凍庫之設計。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

name.en: Reading and Discussions on Global Affairs

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
description.en: Through reading and discussions, the students are guided to understand some of the most important issues that have affected the present world and its future.  These topics include globalization in world economy, health care problems, environmental protection, racial conflicts, and genetic engineering.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

name.en: World Literatures and Cultures in English

description.zh: 本課程旨在藉由各種文化媒體（如文學作品，書報雜誌，期刊論文，電影等影音文字）引導學生選擇性地認識英國、愛爾蘭、美國、加拿大、非洲、澳洲、紐西蘭、印度、巴基斯坦、新加坡、香港、菲律賓、加勒比海等國家或地區的文學與文化。藉由認識上述這些國家或地區的英語文學與文化，擴展學生英語文應用的宏觀視野，並使之具備促進異國情感及文化交流的能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to the selected literatures and cultures of English-speaking countries and areas such as England, Ireland, the United States, Canada, Anglophone Africa, Australia, New Zealand, India, Pakistan, Singapore, Hong Kong, the Philippines, and the Caribbean. In this course, world literatures in English, together with various cultural media (including newspaper, magazine and journal articles as well as Internet materials and films), will be examined to introduce students to Anglophone literatures and cultures. Students are expected to acquire via this course a nuanced, discriminating literary and cultural competency. With this cross-cultural literacy, they could help promote international understanding and global cultural exchange.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is enable students to enhance their Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education
Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 經理需要以現代管理必要的 "資訊-基礎"來支持，俾使達到和滿足(相遇)他們的組織目標。管理資訊系統(MIS) 是整合使用者和機構系統，用以提供一個組織之操作支援，管理分析，和決策功能。我們以學習資訊工作者的角色，幫助經理滿足(相遇)組織目標， 以及檢查資訊系統的特徵，使經理工作更容易順暢。學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢、透過資訊系統應用，支持經理和執行、管理固有的冒險，俾使發展和資訊系統應用、獲得和實踐技術性領導
description.en: 英文概述	The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. A management information system (MIS) is an integrated user + Machine system that provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning:‧Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems.‧Supporting managers and executives through IS applications.‧Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications.‧Attaining and practicing technological leadership.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality.  In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study.  The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

name.zh: 創意與創新管理事業化
name.en: How to implement innovation into realized enterprise

description.zh: 在許多場合，無論是研討會、交流會等均會有許多創意點子出現，但多數的點子有如雨水一般，如果不能蓄存，散落後就消失；反之如果有系統收集，它就成為企業創新的主要來源，而透過企業創新的多元面向，如產品創新、流程創新、行銷創新等，均可為企業帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程主要內容有產品創新、流程創新、經營模式創新、行銷創新、識別系統創新、組織創新、新事業創新、創意與創新管理事業化等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。
description.en: In many seminar and mutual discussion cases, there are many good ideas happened. But innovation like rain fall, if we don't have reservoir to keep it, It will rain everywhere and disappeared. If we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to enterprise and rises its competing ability. From "How to establish an enterprise" classes, We find many students have many good ideas, If we can give them more advanced knowledge to use such ideas, It will benefit them success in establish an enterprise.

name.en: Statistical Data Analysis Using Computer Software

description.zh: 訓練學生應用統計套裝軟體進行資料整理、陳列、分析、解釋及統計推論，以建立學生使用統計套裝軟體進行統計資料分析之能力。課程主題包括敘述統計之圖表製作、假設檢定、信賴區間、變異數分析和迴歸模型。學期末，學生應能以標準統計分析程序，分析商業資料，並根據統計分析之結果，建議可行之企業決策。
description.en: This course reviews and expands upon core topics in probability andstatistics through the study and practice of data analysis. Topicsinclude numerical and graphical summaries of data, hypothesis testing,confidence intervals, analysis of variance, and regression. Uponcompletion of this course, students should be able to think criticallyabout data and apply standard statistical inference procedures to drawconclusions from such analysis.

description.zh: 解析國內國家考試「會計學」之命題趨勢。並以實際國家考試考古題為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Resolve domestic national examination "Accounting" Trend proposition. And the actual state exam archaeological entitled case in the problem solving process to guide students to build a complete system of accounting theory, enhance students' understanding of accounting theory and application capabilities, develop logical thinking of students, and enhance problem-solving skills, passed the national exam.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於幫助學生學習商業簡報的專業技巧。主要議題包括口語表達技巧、投影片設計、以及求職面談要領等。課程內容對於商業實務的應用部分也會在課程中討論。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop professional skills in business presentation. Topics include (but not limited to) oral presentation skills, powerpoint designing, and employment interview tips. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 本課程之設計，以介紹資料庫之概念與技術為主。課程重點為關聯式資料庫的相關概念與技術。本課程包括下列主題：資料庫系統簡介、紀錄儲存與檔案組織、索引檔案結構、關聯性模型、關聯性幾何及演算、SQL查詢語言、關聯式資料庫設計、功能相依性、正規化處理、查詢語言最佳化處理、資料庫系統技術。進階主題包含物件導向資料庫、多媒體資料庫、分散式資料庫、資料庫之平行操作相關問題等。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce concepts and skills essential in the database systems. Relational database will be the main focus with related topics such as relational model, design concepts, and structured query language. The topics to be covered include: introduction to database systems, record storage and file organizations, indexed structures for files, the relational model, relational algebra and calculus, SQL, conceptual and logical design for relational database, functional dependencies, normalization, query optimization and database technology. Advanced topics include object-oriented database, multimedia database, distributed database, and concurrent operations on database.

description.zh: １.電腦網路概述與網路階層結構２.路由與交換技術與協定 ３.錯誤、流量與擁塞控制 ４.媒體存取控制 ５.區域網路技術與應用６.網際網路協定與標準７.網路互連技術８.網路機制效能評估
description.en: １.Computer network overview and layered communications２.	Routing and switching protocol３.Error, flow and congestion control ４.Medium access control ５.Local area networks６.	Network protocols and standards ７.Network interconnection８.Performance analysis

description.en: Invited talk or group discussion.

description.zh: 本課程介紹連續時間與離散時間訊號與系統的基本概念。訊號與系統的分析廣泛地應用在模擬、分析、與設計實際物理過程。本課程可做為線性系統、通訊系統與數位訊號處理等較進階課程之基礎課程。授課內容大綱如下：1.訊號與系統簡介2.線性非時變系統3.週期訊號之傅立葉級數表示法4.連續時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析5.離散時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析6.取樣7.調變8.濾波9.拉普拉斯變換10.Z變換
description.en: This course covers fundamental concepts in signals and systems, which are broadly used for modeling, analyzing, and designing physical processes. Both the continuous-time and the discrete-time aspects will be considered. This course can be viewed as the prerequisite for the advanced courses such as linear systems, communication systems and digital signal processing.  The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.Introduction to Signals and Systems2.	Linear Time-invariant Systems3.Fourier Series Representation for Periodical Signals4.Fourier Analysis for Continuous-time Signals and Systems5.Fourier Analysis for Discrete-time Signals and Systems6.Sampling7.	Modulation8.Filtering9.	Laplace Transform10.Z Transform

description.zh: 1.介紹視窗程式語言及其物件導向特性 2.基礎視窗程式設計 3.動態連結程式庫之程式設計 4.視窗圖形使用者界面設計 5.視窗I/O界面設計 6.多媒體程式寫作 7.DDE與OLE之程式設計 8.視窗多執行緒之程式設計
description.en: 1. introduction to windows programming language and its object-oriented design 2. fundamental windows programming 3. programming with dynamic-link library 4. design of windows GUI 5. windows I/O interface programming 6. multi-media programming 7. programming with DDE and OLE 8. windows programming with multithreads.

description.zh: 先修課程：普通物理、工程數學。 從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. The energy band theory of solid state physics is applied to account the optical, electrical, and thermal properties of solid states, also the fundamental principles of semiconductors are introduced.

description.zh: 線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET) ；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
description.en: frequency response,feedback and stability,differential and multistage amplifier,operational amplifier,analog integrated circuits.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。

description.zh: 本課程介雷射之基本特性及雷射光在光學上的應用，內容包括雷射之時間與空間特性、雷射之模態、干涉、繞射、偏振及透鏡之各種像差等實驗。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental characteristics of lasers and the applications of lasers in optics. It includes the experiments of the temporal and spatial characteristics of lasers, the mode distribution of lasers, interference, diffraction, and the abberations of lenses.

description.zh: (1)生醫與光學基礎(2)電子膠囊、內視鏡 (3)顯微鏡相關 (4)光學單離 (5)光學嵌住 (6)雷射美容治療相關 (7)光譜分析 (8)光動力治療、光觸媒法 (9)光學斷層掃描 (10)表面電漿子技術 (11)螢光光電檢測 (12)生物晶片(13)放射線影像
description.en: (1) Basics of bio-optics (2) Optical measurement in Medical engineering(3) Microscopy (4) Micro and nano technology in Laser capture microdissection (5) Laser trapping (6) Laser and skin effects(7) Spectral technology (8) Photodynamic Therapy(PDT) and Photodynamic diagnosis(PDD) (9)Optical Coherence tomography(10) Surface plasmons (11) Fluorescence sensing technology, spectroscopy and pharmacy analysis (12) Biochip Technology(13) Bio-imaging

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

description.zh: 本課程始自ㄧ系列關於「古代哲學」的演講，特別著重於自然主義哲學家的思想，如泰利斯、巴門尼德斯、赫拉克利圖斯，與德摩克利圖斯。藉此讓我們得以瞭解下述議題: 宇宙的基本物質、變化問題，與原子論。接下來，我們會探討希臘哲學，著重於:辯士學派、蘇格拉底、柏拉圖，與亞里斯多德。我們接著探討希臘化時期的學說: 如犬儒主義、斯多葛主義、伊比鳩魯學派、新柏拉圖主義，與神祕主義。最後我們轉向中世紀哲學，再接著探討文藝復興與巴洛克時期的思想。
description.en: The course starts with a series of lectures on ancient philosophy with an emphasis of thoughts presented by the Naturalistic philosophers who initiate our research interest in the Nature and our surroundings such as Thales, Parmenides, Heraclitus, and Democritus.  By doing so we would learn the following important topics such as the basic matter of the universe, the problem of change, and atomism.  We then shall move onto Greek philosophy with a particular look at the following philosophers: the Sophists, Socratics, Plato, and Aristotles.  Afterwards, we will study the theories and accounts during the Hellenistic period such as Cynicism, Stoicism, Epicureanism, Neo-Platonism, and Mysticism. We then will turn to Medieval philosophy, followed by a close look at thoughts appeared in the Renaissance and Baroque era.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生的的口語溝通技巧，同時培養精準的表達能力，透過故事轉化、技巧傳授、對話練習、簡報技巧的實務練習，培養學生具有準確、沉穩具思考力及說服力的溝通與表達能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce different skills related to oral communication strategy, which includes personal communication, power point and oral presentation, stories narration, critical thinking strategies, and the communication ways of TED.

description.zh: 文化創意產業含蓋甚廣，不僅僅包含了人文、藝術，甚至在族群文化振興、媒體研究、博物館經營與藝術管理、大眾消費、設計等領域都被重視。也因為文化創意是一塊值得投資的領域，更誘引這些族群的工作者紛紛投入與文化創意產業結合的工作。而本課程將全程使用英文來授課，也可藉由閱讀國內外文化創意相關文章，培養學生的英文閱讀、聽、說、與寫作能力，進而培養更多元的國際觀。
description.en: Covering a wide cultural and creative industry, the cultural vocation development not only includes the humanities, arts, and even has been valued at ethnic culture promotion; media studies, museum management and arts management, marketing, design, and other related these fields. Because of the cultural and creative field is a worthwhile investment; this reason inspires workers that have invested in these communities, cultural, and creative industries combined work. And through this course will be taught in English, but also by learning the foreign cultural related the cultural articles, students can practice English reading, listening, speaking, and writing skills, and to cultivate more diversified international views.

description.zh: 本課程將就臺灣目前的史蹟，依其性質分類使修課學生更進一步瞭解這些史蹟，並透過專家演講及實地參與史蹟導覽活動，學習如何將所學到的史蹟知識介紹給一般旅遊者或有興趣的大眾。
description.en: This course aims to introduce different types of historical sites in Taiwan, and application related to the studies of cultural tourism. Lecturers, speeches and field trips are included in this course to help student to learn the ways to introduce cultural spots to visitors, includes tour planning, stories interpretation and oral presentation.

description.en: 1.Three-dimensional perception: exercises and develop students perception of volume and space. 2.Visual language: development of a personal visual language through creative projects. 3.Material:experience variety of materials such as paper, food, plastic, wire etc.4.Technique: Exploring various possibilities of sculpt, construct and assemble sculpture.5.Creative communication: every project will be discussed during class.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業(工業)相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之套特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1.The Characters of business laws. 2.The presentment of civil code. 3.The business registration laws and business laws. 4.The insurance laws.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts and approaches of systems analysis including systems analysis, systems design, systems establishment, and systems evaluation and testing.

description.zh: 財務報表所反映的是企業的經營績效，不同的產業有不同的特質、不同的經營環境，即使在相同的產業中，企業若採行不同的競爭策略，在財務報表上也會有不同的表現。本課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何透過財務報表，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：1) 基本財務報導與特別科目的報導與分析 2) 基本分析理論 3) 償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 5) 探討我國最近發佈的7號、34號及35號會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes 1) financial reports and analysis of special accounting subjects; 2) basic financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 為培育學生瞭解當前投資決策與理財之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的投資決策模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其證券投資分析、金融工具分析、企業評價及資本市場之基本與技術分析等決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的投資專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
description.en: To nurture students to understand the practical skills of the current investment knowledge, through the investment decision-making simulation laboratory, students build their equity investment analysis, financial instruments, business evaluation, the fundamental and technical analysis of capital market, and other decision-making ability. Further training students to obtain international and domestic investment professional certification exams in order to achieve the goal of seamless integration of theory and practice.

description.zh: 企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。本課程將介紹：1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理2. 企業與客戶間的客戶倫理3. 企業與同業間的競爭倫理4. 企業與股東間的股東倫理5. 企業與社會間的社會責任6. 企業與政府間的政商倫理
description.en: Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 1. Ethics between employer and employee2. Ethics between enterprise and client3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder5. Ethics between enterprise and society6. Ethics between enterprise and government

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解衍生性金融市場的運作，如何利用，及其定價模式。內容包括選擇權市場機制的介紹、股票選擇權的特性及其交易策略、Black-Sholes模型、及風險值的討論等。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand how the derivatives markets work, how they can be used, and what determines the price. The course includes the following topics: the options market and its mechanics, properties of the stock options, the trading strategies, the Black-Sholes Model, and the Value at Risk.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計實務之進行了解其應用。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及方法操作以及設計執行等方式進行，並以作業繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and application of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through case studies, method simulation and design practice. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case studies, and design practice. Students are evaluated by design work, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 排光華階梯教室,本系生&第2專長(B)修,上限60人

description.zh: 本課程以專案整合的思維，導引學生學習使用者腳本的設計，以及使用者經驗的分析，提出互動科技技術的分析，並以互動程式的撰寫，完成互動科技應用系統的發展與評估。
description.en: This course provides a project-oriented method for students to learn the integration of interactive programming design in the aspect of interaction design, interactive game and interactive arts project development.

notes: 選課人數上限60人(本系學生優先)

description.zh: 本課程旨在整合應用程式與設計，完成具互動媒體設計作品。為達成此目標，本課程培養學生熟悉與整合互動設計的理論、方法與應用，以具互動性的媒體設計議題，訓練學生獨立創作或分組合作設計，藉此訓練學生創意思考、應用科技與新知的實作能力，同時也可結合產學合作專案於教學活動內，達到務實致用的目標。
description.en: This course applies design and programming into interaction design projects relating to media design. To achieve this goal, students will familiarize the theories, methodology and implications of interactive media design in this course. By interaction design issues, students create and implement ideas by brainstorming through independent study or cooperative learning. For competition without any gap, industry-academic cooperation is one way to prepare student’s critical competencies same as the desired competencies required by the industry.

notes: 媒體設計組必修(限本系學生)

description.zh: 本課程旨在整合應用程式與設計，完成具互動性的視覺傳達設計作品。為達成此目標，本課程培養學生熟悉與整合互動設計的理論、方法與應用，以具互動性的視覺設計議題，訓練學生獨立創作或分組合作設計，藉此訓練學生創意思考、應用科技與新知的實作能力，同時也可結合產學合作專案於教學活動內，達到務實致用的目標。
description.en: This course applies design and programming into interaction design projects relating to visual communication design. To achieve this goal, students will familiarize the theories, methodology and implications of visual communication design in this course. By interaction design issues, students create and implement ideas by brainstorming through independent study or cooperative learning. For competition without any gap, industry-academic cooperation is one way to prepare student’s critical competencies same as the desired competencies required by the industry.

notes: 視覺傳達設計組必修(限本系學生)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，配合設計實務的操作，使學生能充分了解使用者介面設計的流程以及相關的應用，始其具有能進行使用者使用者介面實務製作的能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theory of user interface design, accompanying with design practice. This will allow students to understand the process of user interface design and related application, so as to be capable of practical interface design. The contents include conceptual model, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and design work.

notes: 排普通教室,本系生與第2專長(B)修,上限50人

description.zh: 本課程概念為數位化產品設計與開發介紹，為使學生明白數位化產品設計與開發在現代產業中的重要性，課程重點將介紹出版編輯觀念之基礎認識，讓學生增進對數位出版流程的理解，在設計過程中兼顧學理介紹與實務應用。另外探討數位劇本之優點、特性、設計步驟與要領、講述策略、核心技術、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course is intended not only to familiarize students with the importance of digital products and development in the industry, but also to investigate the basic knowledge of editing and publishing. Students will have a combination of theoretical and practical training in this course.

notes: 視覺傳達設計組選修(人數上限55人)

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-社哲(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(一)

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(一)

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.en: Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PNdiode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing adiscrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point isdiscussed. description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。五 複變分析及映射轉換。

Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh: 線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器；振盪器。

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training. name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-自然(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(二)

description.zh: 集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，拉式轉換。
description.en: Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallelcircuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuitanalysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuitsPSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and Statistics Description:This course is designed for students to get concepts and methods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this course is establishment of the foundations of industrial management, quality control, and industrial economics.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en: Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PNdiode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing adiscrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point isdiscussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and usedto calculate the performance of low frequency single stage andcascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, itscharacteristics and applications are described.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en: This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh: 線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器；振盪器。

description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

description.zh: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
description.en: Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.

description.zh: 以數學與物理的方法來探討化學之原理，物質之結構與性質，內容包括由氣體動力論衍導熱力學之基本定律，物理平衡（相平衡）、化學平衡、溶液論、電化學、反應動力學、量子力學、光譜學、表面現象、輸送性質等。
description.en: This course deals with the principle of chemistry, structure and properties of matter by the matter matical and physical methods. Topics include the kinetic theory of gases, basis laws of thermodgnamics, physical equilibria (phase equilibria ), chemical equilibria, solutions, electrochemistry, chemical kinetics, quantum mechanics, spectroscopy, surface phenomena and transport properties etc.

description.zh: 訓練學生以實驗技巧，探討理論，認識儀器，並對實驗結果之數據與現象做評析與處理。
description.en: This course is to train students by experimental techniques and the principles of physical chemistry, and to become familiar with laboratory apparatus. Both the phenomena and data results of experiments are explained and treated.

description.zh: 介紹化工程序中物質於一系統中流進、流出間質量、能量均衡之原理與計算，使學生學習列出質能均衡之基本式子並查尋相關文獻，手冊上所登錄之物性資料以解決問題。
description.en: The course introduces the material and energy balances of the chemical process.  Students learn to define the system, practice the conservation law of mass and energy, and look up handbook for necessary information.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.zh: 本課程介紹自然科學的起源、近代自然科學的誕生與發展。各領域含物理學、化學、生物學、天文學、數學等，並介紹各項科學技術。
description.en: This is an introductory course concerning about the origin of nature science, the genesis and developments of the modern physics science.  The topics of physics science are physics, chemistry, biology, astronomy, and mathematics.  The contents and characteristic of various technology are also discussed in this course.

notes: 化工大二合開,初選人數限制55人

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(三)

description.zh: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
description.en: Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.

description.zh: 以數學與物理的方法來探討化學之原理，物質之結構與性質，內容包括由氣體動力論衍導熱力學之基本定律，物理平衡（相平衡）、化學平衡、溶液論、電化學、反應動力學、量子力學、光譜學、表面現象、輸送性質等。
description.en: This course deals with the principle of chemistry, structure and properties of matter by the matter matical and physical methods. Topics include the kinetic theory of gases, basis laws of thermodgnamics, physical equilibria (phase equilibria ), chemical equilibria, solutions, electrochemistry, chemical kinetics, quantum mechanics, spectroscopy, surface phenomena and transport properties etc.

description.zh: 訓練學生以實驗技巧，探討理論，認識儀器，並對實驗結果之數據與現象做評析與處理。
description.en: This course is to train students by experimental techniques and the principles of physical chemistry, and to become familiar with laboratory apparatus. Both the phenomena and data results of experiments are explained and treated.

description.zh: 介紹化工程序中物質於一系統中流進、流出間質量、能量均衡之原理與計算，使學生學習列出質能均衡之基本式子並查尋相關文獻，手冊上所登錄之物性資料以解決問題。
description.en: The course introduces the material and energy balances of the chemical process.  Students learn to define the system, practice the conservation law of mass and energy, and look up handbook for necessary information.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main taget is to introduce math region which is relating to practical questions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation, linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exact perception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put more emphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to the practical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solving question concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 材料之結晶構造及一般性質簡介，由簡單之單成份系，二成份系，到三成份系之平衡狀態圖，解釋各平衡狀態圖之相變態過程，並以顯微組織圖作輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。
description.en: This course is to introduce Phase Diagrams and Microstructure.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies the theory of thermaldynamics to calculate chemical potential energy and its equilibrium of condensed phase, released pressure and activated factors, solution thermaldynamics, complex metal solution , phase diagram and phase change, computer-aided phase reaction and phase diagram simulation, and planning a mathmatics model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 材料之特性取決於材料內部組織，所以課程內容也注重內部組織與材料特性之間的關係，內部組織的變化對材料特性之影響，由理論為基礎之探討至實際之應用上。對本課程有關的基本概念，則詳加說明，初學材料者能得到材料上所必備之基本知識，若基本概念已有充分了解，則利用這些知識即可參考材料規格或手冊就可得到欲知之條件，進而以此概念作基礎，亦可研習更高深之學問，本課程內容著重於介紹材料之結構，基本原理有： 1. 金屬之基本理論，金屬及合金之構造，材料之組織，塑性加工變形之理論，材料之物理化學，機械性質及其實驗。 2. 鋼和鐵之製造，組織及其熱處理，變態理論。 3. 構造用鋼，合金鋼，工具鋼，特殊鋼之特性、用途及其熱處理方法。4. 鋼之表面硬化理論及其熱處理方法。 5. 鑄鐵之冶煉，種類及其熱處理方法。6.非鐵金屬材料，銅，鋁，鈦，鎂，錫，鋅，鉛，鎳等合金種類之特性及其處理方法。
description.en: The chacteristics of material depend on the inside tissue, therefore, the content alsoput more emphasis on the relationship between the inside tissue and material chacter-istics, how the change of inside tissue influences it in full details from the discussion of the theory basis to practical application. It has a detail description to the basic ideaof this course, the novice may get requisite fundamental knowledge. Once they fullyperceive these basic ideas, they may refer to material specification or manual to getthe conditions they request, or they may use these fundation to further exploreadvanced knowledge.

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、鑽石、電子束、離子束、電漿、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，由冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過冶金課程的學生，能進一步對製造技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: Introduction to manufacturing processes, and introducing newest manufacturing technology. Applying physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials,

description.zh: 介紹各種奈米結構材料：奈米碳管、奈米線、量子點、量子線和奈米複合材料的基本特性以及製備與應用技術，期能對奈米材料的物性、製造與應用有整體的認識。
description.en: This course will deal with the chemical and physical properties of nanomaterials. It will cover the preparation, structure, properties and applications of quantum dots and lines, carbon nanotubes, and nanocomposites.

description.zh: 課程主要目標，是要使工程科系，發展出以簡單而合於邏輯的方式分析任何問題，並應用一些為大家熟悉的基本原理加以解答。本課程內容分成質點力學及剛體力學兩部分，剛體力學部分又分為靜力學及動力學。除介紹力學中的基本觀念及定理外更解釋及預測各種物理現象，進而打好工程應用的基礎。提供同學分析及設計各種機件和承載荷重結構的方法，課程內容將介紹某些依據基本定理而化簡的數學模式，進而分析及設計作用在結構上的各種條件，使同學在選擇或運用材料上有安全與正確的觀念，以便在理論與經驗的配合下，順利地處理材料在工程上所發生的問題。
description.en: The major target of this course is to let the engineering students develop and analyze any questions with an easy and logical way, and to try to solve them with some well-recognized fundamental principles. The course can be divided into particle dynamics and rigid body dynamics, the latter can be further divided into statics and dynamics. Apart from introducing the fundamental concept and law, it also explains and forecasts all kinds of nature physic phenomenon, in order to establish a good foundation for engineering application science. It provides methods for students to analyze and design all kinds of machine elements, bearing load structure as well, the course content will introduce some implified math models which are based on fundamental principles, and further analyze and design all conditions to the structure , let students have a safe and exact concept in choosing and utilizing materials, so that the theory and experience can be well matched, and the problems arisen from hand.

description.zh: 本課程討論，化學中相關物理量的基本理論，技巧及應用等，特別是化學熱力學及電化學等。有關氣相，氣体定理，熱量，功，熱力學第一、第二及第三定律，焓，熵，自由能，相平衡，溶液，化學平衡，酸鹼，電化學，電極，電池，半反應等基礎理論之探討。
description.en: This course discuss the fundamental theory, technique and application with regards to physical property in chemistry, especially at the chemical thermal dynamics and electrical chemistry. The research of the fundamental theory about gaseous phase, the gas laws, heat, work, the first, second and third law of the thermodynatmics, entropy, enthalpy, free energy, phase equilbrium, solution, chemicalequilbrium, acid and alkali, electrical chemistry, electrode,electric cell,half reaction ,etc.

notes: 禮拜一(13~18週)為四教203，禮拜五(12~18週)為四教102

description.en: Introduce students about minerals and rocks composition, fabric, physical and chemical properties , observation and identify the basic knowledge. description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原 理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺 陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物 理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度 、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。

description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. description.zh: 為培養土木工程系大學部學生瞭解設計圖中內容，本課程採用實務的教學方式，以工程師實際面對的建築設計圖、結構設計圖、土木設計圖及機電設計圖等，加以解說圖面內容並引導學生理解設計涵義及實作演練。並結合工程知識、營建工程實務操作及專案管理領域整合的能力，使學生畢業後與業界無縫接軌。本課程主要內容如下:1.熟悉一個工程或建案中必備之完整圖面內容2.熟悉設計圖上各種符號、線條之用處及表示的意義3.結構標準圖、配筋圖與施工規範之解說4.如何依設計圖進行工程品質之查驗5.其他與勞工安全相關知識等
description.en: To improve undergraduate civil engineering students to understand the design drawings reading ability. The course also includes practical exercise for students to read the drawings, and to understand the information in the drawings. The course will also involves the knowledge of engineering to enhance the integration ability of all the design drawings for the students. The contents of this  course are listed as below:1.To familiar with the whole set design drawings.2.To familiar with the meaning of symbols, lines and expression in the design drawings.3.To understand general notes, general drawings, reinforcement and specification in structural design drawings.4.How to inspect the construction quality by the design drawings.5.Other topics about labor-safety
