description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. description.en: This course introduces students of engineering, physics, and mathematics to those areas of mathematics which are most important in connection with practical problems.  The contents are Ordinary Differential Equations, Linear Algebra, Fourier Analysis, and Numerical Methods.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
description.en: The aim of this course is to educate students to think independently about organic chemistry. The course is divided into three parts;introductory material(concepts of structure and bonding);organic reactions and mechanism(sigma-bond chemistry followed by  pi-bond chemistry);and topics of more specialized interest.

description.zh: 使學生對工程力學原理之理論與應用具有清晰、完整的概念。內容涵蓋：基本觀念，力系的平衡、摩擦、慣性矩和慣性積，質點的運動學與動力學，應力和應變，扭矩、彎力矩、樑的撓曲。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to provide the student with a clear and thorough presention of the theory and application of engineering mechanics.  The text contains general principles, equilibrium of force system, friction, moments of inertia, kinetics and dynamics of a particle, stress and strain, torsion, bending moment and bending of beam.

name.en: Textile materials and principles of textile Technology

description.zh: 1. 本課程主要說明各種紡織材料之組成和成形, 基本性質, 各種加工與應用。 2. 本課程主要簡介紡織科技所包含之原料與製程, 製品和評估，同時訓練學生了解基本的紡織辭彙。
description.en: 1. Introduction to textile compositions, properties, spinning, processings and applications. 2. Textile materials and related processes are introduced, and technical used are learned as well.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD.  From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物大分子及構成這些生物分子的基本分子。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA、脂質、糖類結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。構成蛋白質的二十種氨基酸和組成DNA或RNA的四個核甘酸及構成脂質、糖類結構的生物分子將詳細被探討。
description.en: This course is to introduce a serials of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The characters of 20 amino acids and 4 nucleotides will be studied in detail. Carbohydrates and lipids are learned by their specific functions.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Aesthetics and Arts

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的藝術涵養。透過生活美學、藝術概論與音樂概論等相關課程，引導學生探索如何從認識藝術到應用於生活。從探索視覺藝術與音樂發展的整體性，到建構欣賞和審美意涵之基礎，期望能廣泛的從「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動，重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的美學視野。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the artistic conservation of our students. Though the related course, such as Aesthetics of living, Introduction to Art Theories and Introduction to Music, which guild students to explore art into their daily life.The Exploration of the development of visual art and music is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on arts in order to foster students to appreciate and apply it into lifestyles and social environment.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-美學(三)

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education： History and Literatural

description.zh: 本課程目標要使學生瞭解歷史與文化範疇的知識，以培養歷史思維與文化涵養，促進的歷史意識與文化鑑賞力。歷史與文化領域將提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文化的發展，剖析歷史與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgement with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan, China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-文史(二)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(二)

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en: 1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order3.Laplace transforms4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh: 1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh: 1.集合,序列與函數2.基礎邏輯3.關聯式4.計數（排列,組合）5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）6.遞迴式與演算法7.有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 1.通訊工程簡介2.調幅與調頻3.傳輸與接收系統4.衛星通訊簡介5.數據通訊簡介6.光纖通訊簡介7.電話系統簡介8.行動通訊簡介
description.en: 1.Introductions2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers4.Introduction to Satellite Communications5.Introduction to Data Communications6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications7.Introduction to Telephone System8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer2.Central processor unit 3.Microprogramming set4.Assemblylanguage programming5.Interfacing circuits6.ROM/RAM interface7.I/O operations8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh: 1.集合,序列與函數2.基礎邏輯3.關聯式4.計數（排列,組合）5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）6.遞迴式與演算法7.有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer2.Central processor unit 3.Microprogramming set4.Assemblylanguage programming5.Interfacing circuits6.ROM/RAM interface7.I/O operations8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(四)

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:1. engineering of materials2. forming of materials 3. traditional casting processes4. broaching and sawing5. turning and boring6. drilling and reaming7. milling and grinding8. machine tools 9. nontraditional machining

description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

notes: 工管大二合開/五34節使用計中電腦教室

description.en: This is the lecture of furniture engineering drawing technique and related knowledge, It emphases on the main difference between furniture engineering drawing and normal engineering drawing. description.en: This course aims to provide the student with knowledge of marketing, including product strategy, physical distribution, channel and pricing. Case study and discuss through activities (planning, investigation, analysis and presentation) that carry out strategic marketing are employed from time to time.

description.zh: 講授並整合產品設計之基本理論、方法及程序。藉設計題目之演練，以分組討論之方式，引導同學學習組織表達及分析思考之能力；並以個別指導之方式，引導同學磨練創意之思考及熟練之表達技巧。
description.en: This course intergral the theoretical principle methodology and the process of produces design Guide the design student to work on design projects through group discussion and individual practice with creative thinking and presentation technique.

description.zh: 介紹傳統以及特殊加工法、製造法、金屬、非金屬材料之製造加工。
description.en: In the design and manufacturing of a product is is essential that the machine as wellas the process be understood, Manufacturing requires tools and machines that can produce products economically as well as accurately. Economy depends to a large extent on the proper selection of a machine or process that will give a satisfactory finished porduct. This course serves as an introduction to various manufacturing, foundry, special casting, and special working process.

description.en: The Course is divided into five units : 1). The Nineteenth Century : The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. description.zh: 本課程藉由家具相關設計競賽活動或產學合作計畫案，讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法。本課程同時配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，期能習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。
description.en: The course through furniture design contest or industry-academy cooperation project, let students practice the design procedure and creative methods. The course coordinate the other courses: furniture construction and practice, furniture drawing, computer aided furniture design etc, expect getting the capability of creativity design and product engineering.

description.zh: 課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、殼類家具結構特性等。
description.en: This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年課程視為建築設計之基礎課題，從建築美學之觀點培養基本素養、建築模樣體驗、設計實作再造，達到建築設計基本知識之體態。並結合一年級橫向課程之實作、圖學、設計理論、全能住宅改造等課程，課程規劃以多元建構為主，其養成要點如下:1. 美學再創造：基本美學素養養成，將感知中的聽覺、視覺、觸覺等與美學體驗再度結合，用思考轉換形式。奠定日後進入空間美學基礎。2. 建築繪圖與表現技巧：建築相關圖學與識圖展現養成，體驗空間感受與空間掌握，美學與繪圖思考整合。3. 空間構成與思維邏輯：將2D轉為3D，藉由點、線、面、體之基本元素，將環境觀察或是感知等邏輯分析，呈現空間的比例、尺度或透過實作技術等理論，重構思維進一步與環境共構將空間再塑。4. 設計實務養成：為因應環境友善，與環境共存之議題如何運用在設計之中，探討行為模式、機能、線安排空間組織等等，將環境之感受能力，以空間再改造展現能力，由於重於綠材料之實作特色，因此實作養成之重要關鍵之一，需配合全能改造課程。達到創作性實務，可說是實驗性實作的特色課程。5.材料與構築實驗：體驗材料之特性，將材料之特性發揮到極限。
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. The course as the fundamental of architectural design aims to foster basic knowledge from the perspective of architectural aesthetics, experience, and design execution. Combined with the lateral curriculum of construction, drawing, design theory, and housing renewal projects, the program built upon diversified exposures in 1. aesthetics, 2. architectural drawings and rendering techniques, 3. spatial constructs and logics, 4.  Professional training, 5.  materials and experiments, 6. communication and presentation.Studio introduction to architect

description.zh: 介紹建築計劃的基本精神，方法，及各種類型建築的建築計劃案例分析一．建築計劃基本精神１．建築與生活、生產的關係２．建築計劃之定位３．建築計劃之構成、內容４．建築計劃學的發展過程二．建築計劃的方法１．需求的產生與界定２．建築計劃的調查方法３．建築計劃的分析方法４．建築計劃的定量計劃（尺寸與規模計劃）５．建築計劃的調查方法（空間、機能、集合與複合）三．建築計劃案例分析

The topic include：1、the basic philosophy of architecture planningl	the relationship between planning and living、productionl	the scope of architecture planning l	the content of architecture planningl	the developing period of architecture planning2、the methods of architecture planningl	the happening of needs & its definitionl	the investigation methods of architecture planning l	the analysis methods of architecture planning l	the quantity planning of architecture planning （size & scale planning）l	space、function、accumulate & complex 3、case study of architecture planning

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生認識建築物理環境之基本理論，包含光環境、溫熱環境、空氣環境、音環境等，做為學習建築環境控制系統與建築設備之基礎。本課程內容分為七大部分，包括(一)建築氣象學概論、(二)建築微氣候環境、(三)建築採光與照明、(四)建築傳熱與隔熱、(五)室內通風換氣、(六)濕氣與結露、(七) 隔音與吸音等課題。本學期介紹物理環境基本學理外，同時輔以相關案例補充說明，幫助學生在建築設計中能關注到使用者舒適、健康需求，並使其建築設計符合節能的永續建築要求。
description.en: In this course, students will learn about the fundamental theories of architecture physics which include luminous environment, thermal environment, air environment, and sound environment as an introduction to understanding Systems of Environment Control and Architectural Equipment. The course is divided into 7 sections, (1) Introduction to Architecture Meteorology, (2) Architecture Microclimate, (3) Natural Lighting and Illumination of architecture, (4) Thermal Conduction and Proofing of Architecture, (5) Indoor Air Change and Ventilation, (6) Humidity and Condensation, and  (7) Sound absorption and proofing.  In this semester, other than introducing the fundamental theories, related case studies are also incorporated as additional support to help students to be attentive toward issues such as comfort and health in their architectural design class at the same time to encourage the utilization of such knowledge to create energy saving and sustainable architectural designs.

description.zh: 現代主義運動，帶動了新建築的發展，也致使廿世紀的建築有了全新的可能。工業革命之後所帶動的，不僅僅是生產與製造的工業化，也不僅僅是資本的集中以及資本量的大幅成長。整個十九世紀的發展都是為了邁向一個全新的紀元，營建材料的開發、營建技術的發展、空間概念的突破，開創新的建築面貌以及新的建築歷史。這個將近兩百年的建築發展，影響了廿世紀的建築教育，並且提供養分，供給新的世代的建築新發展。本課程將就十九、廿世紀的建築發展的歷史脈絡進行梳理，學生將由本課程理解今日其所進行的建築設計之來源。
description.en: The Modern Movement of Architecture leads the development of new architecture, it thus deduce a whole new possibility of architecture. The Industrial Revolution is the motor of the whole movement. The building construction is industrialized under this overall influence to the society, not only on the concentration of capitals. The social life has been changed. Nineteenth Century is a struggling period with European tradition, moving forward to a new imagination, on the development of construction material, technics, also on the breakthrough on the spatial concept.This evolution on architecture influences architectural education of 20th Century, and feeds the new creation of architecture. This course is to understand this historic evolution and context, to understand the source and establish knowledge in face of their future architectural activities.

description.zh: 應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
description.en: Students will learn to sketch by hand in various tools and technologies on design drawings. The simple painting tips as, spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation will be taught in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要是在教導學生了解力學之概念與分析方法，使其具備學習結構學之基礎能力，其主要授課內容包括：1.力學之基本概念及平衡條件、2.構材之斷面性質如形心、重心、面積一次矩、慣性矩及其應用、3.結構構材承受軸向載重、扭力、彎矩之分析及設計應用、4.應力及應變之關係、5.梁之變形，柱之性質以及各種分析理論。
description.en: This course introduced the concept of mechanics and provided the principles of structural analysis, the course consists of(1)	Equations of equilibrium(2)	Frame Section Properties (3)	Shear and moment diagrams (4)	Relationships of stress and strainDeflection of beams and Column characteristics

description.zh: 本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

description.zh: 本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。
description.en: As a parts and accessories to Architectural Design course, the goal of this seminar is to help students enhance their design proficiency superior to the excellent skill level of design. A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education： History and Literatural

description.zh: 本課程目標要使學生瞭解歷史與文化範疇的知識，以培養歷史思維與文化涵養，促進的歷史意識與文化鑑賞力。歷史與文化領域將提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文化的發展，剖析歷史與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgement with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan, China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-文史(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(一)

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading condition equations, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 電之基本概念，直流基本電路，電場與磁場，電磁效應，交流之基本概念，交流基本電路，電機基本原理，變壓器，三相感應電動機，單向交流電動機，同步電機，直流電機之分類及特性，直流電機之控制，伺服電動機之分類及特性，電機之維護。
description.en: Introduction to Electricity, DC Circuit Analysis, Electric Field and Magnetic Field, Magnetic Effect, AC Circuit Analysis, Principles of electrical Machinery, Transformers, Three-phase Induction Motor, Single-phase Induction Motor, Synchronous Electric Machinery, DC Electric Machinery, Control of DC Motor, Maintenance of Electric Machinery.

description.zh: C、QBASIC、FORTRAN或LISP，區段架構（變數、輸入／輸出），迴圈（ for,while,do,while ），選擇敘述（ if-else敘述，switch敘述），函數（函數的資料傳遞，外部變數），陣列與字串（陣列中元素之表達，字串），指標（指標與陣列，雙重指標：指向指標的指標），結構、等位以及 ROMBIOS，檔案（標準I/O，記錄I/O，隨機存取），如何設計一個大程式（分開編譯，記憶體式）。
description.en: Computer Languages: C, QBASIC, FORTRAN or LISP (Compiler or Interpreter) Including such as Statements of Flow Control: (Sequence, Selectionand Iteration), Basic Data Type and Input/Ouput Statement Subprograms(Parameters Called by Value and Address), Array, String and pointerStruct, Enum, Union and File How to Design a Large Program (Project,Memory Mode, Library).

description.zh: 先修課程:微積分或負責教授同意常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成-壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning Introduction Fundamentals & definitions Psychrometrics Basic refrigeration cycles & application analysis Compression cycle theory & performance of compressors Compression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controls Cooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils. Refrigerant piping & accessories. Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

description.zh: 教授電腦工程繪圖基礎，包括立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖；並能正確標註尺寸，公差與配合，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the basis of computer engineering drawing, including the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views. Learning to mark dimensions, tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarized the drawings of steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices.

description.zh: (1)基本電路元件介紹; (2)基本電路理論回顧; (3)半導體特性介紹; (4)半導體二極體電路分析技巧; (5)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (6)其他特殊二極體:發光二極體,齊納二極體,…; (7)雙極接合面電晶體工作原理; (8)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (9)雙極接合面電晶體交流小信號電路分析; (10)場效電晶體之分類:接合面型,金氧半增強型,金氧半衰減型,金氧半垂直型,金氧半互補型; (11)場效電晶體工作原理; (12)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (13)場效電晶體交流小信號電路分析
description.en: (1) Introduction to basic circuit components; (2)The review of basic circuit theories; (3)Introduction to the characteristics of semiconductors; (4)Circuit analysis techniques for semiconductor PN diode; (5)The applications of PN diode: Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (6)Special diodes: Light emitting diode(LED), Zener diode, etc.; (7)The operation principles of bipolar junction transistor(BJT); (8)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (9)Small signal analysis for BJT circuits; (10)The classification of field effect transistor(FET): JFET, Enhancement-MOS, Depletion-MOS, VMOS, and CMOS; (11)The operation principles of FET; (12)DC bias circuits for FETs; (13)Small signal analysis for FET circuits

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1.常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，2.拉譜拉斯轉換，3.特殊函數。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1.Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher order ODEs. 2. Laplace transform, 3. Special function.

description.zh: 網路拓樸理論及特立勤定理；節點與網路分析；迴路與切集分析；狀態變數法；自然頻率；網路函數；雙埠網路；計算機輔助分析（PSPICE）；傅氏分析；拉氏轉換。
description.en: 1. The power of single phase and poly- phase, and complex    frequency and power factor correction; the phasor    conception to the Damped sinusoidal forcing function.2. The resonant of frequency response, quality factor and    the width of a resonance     response curve of half-power    frequencies.3. Magnetically coupled circuits and Two-port networks.4. Fourier Analysis and Laplace Transform Techniques.

description.zh: 管路處理、焊接設備及焊接練習、空氣性質測定、冷媒性質測定、基本冷凍循環實習、冷凍系統處理、基本冷凍機電路實習、基本冷凍系統組件之配置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of working with tubing, using with oxyacetylene brazing equipment, air properties measurement, identifying refrigerant by T-P curve, evacuating a system, charging and testing a system, wiring of basic electrical circuit and control circuit.

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-社哲(二)

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

name.en: British and American Literatures and Cultures

description.zh: 本課程引導學生熟悉變遷中之英美文學作品典律，並探討其形成之歷史文化背景及隨變遷所產生之時代意義。課程中將討論與作品相關之社會、政治、文化、心理、哲學、理論等議題，使學生能瞭解欣賞選讀作品，並銳化其思辯能力及分析技巧。學生須於課前詳讀作品，並於課堂上參與討論。
description.en: This course is intended not only to familiarize students with the evolving canon of British and American literatures, but also to investigate its contextual historical and cultural meanings, past as well as present. It aims to sharpen students' critical thinking ability and analytical reading skills by engaging them to discuss social, political, cultural, psychological, philosophical, and theoretical issues that are relevant to their understanding and appreciation of the selected literary works. Students are required to peruse the assigned weekly readings and participate in class discussion.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level. Stimulated theme-based scenarios and authentic content will be used to engage students with the purpose of generating lively conversation, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
description.en: This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生閱讀英美短篇故事，探討其敘事技巧、情節、人物、觀點和語言等，如何在故事中建構意義，並著重故事所傳達的文化意涵。
description.en: This course will guide students to read short fiction written by British and American authors.  By reading a wide range of short stories, we will examine how such narrative techniques as plot, character, point of view and language construct meaning in stories.  We will also examine what these stories tell us about the cultures that produce them.

description.zh: 課程之設計旨在教導學生使其具備科技產業所使用之語言能力、知識和觀點，以利學生未來職涯發展。藉由大量的閱讀及討論，使學生了解科技產業之發展，同時建立學生在實務界的真實情境中所需的高度英語文認知與溝通能力。課程包含科技發展、議題及趨勢的深入分析，以及職場上真實情境的演練。
description.en: This current course is geared to empower students with the language, knowledge and views of technology industry in order to carry out their career goals. Ample opportunities are provided to understand technological and industrial developments through reading and discussions while building high-level of awareness and proficiency of the English language in use to address realistic scenarios in field industries. The course adopts an integrative approach to accommodate in-depth analysis of technological advances, issues and trends as well as real-life workplace scenarios in technology fields of work.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-法治(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(四)

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Statistics is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data.  A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well. The statistical software introduction will also be introduced in the class.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student. The purpose is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹組織內個人之行為以及團體間之種種管理；課程之內容大綱如下：組織行為之功能、組織行為之基礎－個人部份、組織行為之核心、組織動力學、組織行為之過程與結構。
description.en: This course introduces individual behavior in an organization and the management among the organizations. The course is consisted of functions of the organizational behavior (OB), fundamental of OB for individual, core of (OB), and processes and structure of (OB).

description.zh: 中文概述	在接洽商務時能以最基本的日文能力應用在名片交換、自我介紹或洽商時基本會話、禮儀及習俗等之應對。第一篇：商務必備 第一章：交換名片與自我介紹 第二章：電話應對實務 第三章：商務會話實務第二篇：模擬洽商 第一章：到日本訪問時的商務會話實務 第二章：在台與日商買主交涉商業實務第三篇：日本文化有趣篇
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental conversation, courtesies and customs by using the Japanese. In addition to understand the origins and significance of these business behaviors, the students will be requested to conduct a simulated practice, such as changing the business card and self-introduction, in the class to have a better realization.

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)﹐內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力,亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This curriculum enters the step curriculum for the financial accounting. Intermediate accounting requires ever increasing knowledge and refinement of skills. Our goal is to achieve the most educational effective blend of concepts and practice relation to the current intermediate accounting body of knowledge. This course strives to provide the material needed to understand this subject area using IFRS. It may also be helpful to participate in accountant the license test and the government workers examination.

description.zh: 本科目旨在探討人們的選擇行為，亦即如何利用有限的資源，以滿足人類無限的慾望。個體經濟學著眼於價格機能之方析，範圍涵蓋：消費者行為、廠商理論、各種市場的結構分析、以及公共部門的決策。
description.en: Economics explores choice behavior of human beings. Especially, it concerns how people make choice in order to satisfy their unlimited desire under limited resources. Microeconomics focuses on the analysis of price mechanism which involves consumer behavior, firms' decision making, structure of various markets, and public sector.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的藝術涵養。透過生活美學、藝術概論與音樂概論等相關課程，引導學生探索如何從認識藝術到應用於生活。從探索視覺藝術與音樂發展的整體性，到建構欣賞和審美意涵之基礎，期望能廣泛的從「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動，重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的美學視野。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the artistic conservation of our students. Though the related course, such as Aesthetics of living, Introduction to Art Theories and Introduction to Music, which guild students to explore art into their daily life.The Exploration of the development of visual art and music is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on arts in order to foster students to appreciate and apply it into lifestyles and social environment.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-美學(三)

description.en: Linear algebra is a fundamental mathematics course in science and engineering. In this course, the basic concepts and computation skills of linear algebra will be covered. The course includes the following topics: 1.Systems of linear Equations 2.Matrices 3.Determinants 4.Vectors in R2 and R3 5.Vector spaces 6.Linear transformations 7.Eigenvalues and eigenvectors.

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉物件導向設計原理及C++進階程式設計技術，內容含：1. C++ 物件模型 2. 類別與物件3. 建構者與解構者 4. 繼承 5. 虛擬函式與多型 6. 運算子溢載 7. 例外處理 8. 泛型程式設計 9. 標準模板程式庫 10. 期末專題設計
description.en: To familiarize the student with an overview of the object-oriented programming (OOP) paradigm and advanced techniques of the C++ language. Topics include: 1. C++ Object Model 2. Classes and Objects 3. Constructors and Destructors 4. Inheritance 5. Virtual Functions and Polymorphism 6. Operator Overloading 7. Exceptions 8. Generic Programming 9. Standard Template Library 10. Term Project

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 本課程介紹ARM CPU 及以ARM CPU為核心之微算機系統。內容包含：ARM CPU介紹，ARM CPU指令集，SRAM、DRAM、及Flash Memory之介紹，時序圖之閱讀，記憶體及I/O解碼，串列I/O及並列I/O之介紹，計時及計數器之使用，震盪器介紹，A/D及D/A轉換，中斷之使用，及應用實例之介紹。
description.en: This course covers the following topics: introduction to ARM CPU, instruction set of ARM CPU, introduction to DRAM, SRAM and Flash memory, reading of timing diagrams, decoding of memory and I/O, parallel and serial ports, using timers and counters, oscillators, A/D and D/A converters, interrupts, and case study.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹數位多媒體的基本概念與使用技術. 課程內容包含: 1.數位多媒體概論 2.網路多媒體與資訊傳播 3.影像處理原理與方法 4.視訊剪輯原理與DV使用方法 5.網路串流媒體影音同步 6.電腦圖學與卡通動畫 7.多媒體影像資料庫 8.隨選服務與網路現場轉播 9.互動式多媒體標準MPEG-4, MPEG-7 10. 數位多媒體案例實作
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques of digital multimedia. The outline of this course includes: 1.Introduction to Digital Multimedia 2.Networked Multimedia and Information Communication 3.Principle and Methods of Image Processing 4.Principle of Video Editing and Usage of Digital Video Equipments 5.Network Streaming Media and Audio/Video Synchronization 6. Computer Graphics and Cartoon Animation 7.Multimedia Database 8.On-Demand Service and Network Live Broadcast 9.Interactive Multimedia Standard MPEG-4 and MPEG-7 10. Some Case Implementation in Digital Multimedia

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education： History and Literatural

description.zh: 本課程目標要使學生瞭解歷史與文化範疇的知識，以培養歷史思維與文化涵養，促進的歷史意識與文化鑑賞力。歷史與文化領域將提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文化的發展，剖析歷史與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgement with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan, China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-文史(二)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

description.zh: 了解電磁學之基本觀念與應用。（１） 電磁模型（２） 向量分析（３） 靜電場（４） 靜電問題解法（５） 靜電流（６） 靜磁場（７） 時變場與馬克斯威爾定理（８） 平面電磁波（９） 傳輸線理論與應用（１０） 波導及共腔共振器（１１） 天線反輻射原理
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes : 1.Electromafnetic Model. 2.The Vector Analysis. 3.Static Electric Fields. 4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions. 5.Steady Eletric Currents. 6.Steat Mafnetic Fields. 7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations. 8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves. 9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines. 10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators. 11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 克希荷夫定律(KCL, KVL)及綱目電流法、節點電位法及重疊定律、載維寧定律等之電路計算技巧應用；RLC電路之一階、二階電路之暫態自然響應及相量式之於弦波函數穩態分析。
description.en: Some useful tchniques of circuit analysis in mesh current method, nodal analysis, superposition principle and thevenin's theorems and so on; the first order and second order equation for natural response in RLC circuits and phasor concept to forced response in sinusoidal steady-state equation.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 課程大綱如下：1.一階微分方程式 2.二階及高階微分方程式 3.線性微分方程系統 4.常微分方程式之級數解與特殊函數 5.拉氏變換
description.en: The outline of the course includes the following:1. Differential Equations of the Frist Order2. Differential Equations of the Second Order and Higher Order 3. Systems of Linear Differential Equations4. Series Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations and Special Functions 5. The Laplace Transform

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Aesthetics and Arts

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的藝術涵養。透過生活美學、藝術概論與音樂概論等相關課程，引導學生探索如何從認識藝術到應用於生活。從探索視覺藝術與音樂發展的整體性，到建構欣賞和審美意涵之基礎，期望能廣泛的從「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動，重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的美學視野。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the artistic conservation of our students. Though the related course, such as Aesthetics of living, Introduction to Art Theories and Introduction to Music, which guild students to explore art into their daily life.The Exploration of the development of visual art and music is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on arts in order to foster students to appreciate and apply it into lifestyles and social environment.

description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Aesthetics and Arts

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的藝術涵養。透過生活美學、藝術概論與音樂概論等相關課程，引導學生探索如何從認識藝術到應用於生活。從探索視覺藝術與音樂發展的整體性，到建構欣賞和審美意涵之基礎，期望能廣泛的從「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動，重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的美學視野。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the artistic conservation of our students. Though the related course, such as Aesthetics of living, Introduction to Art Theories and Introduction to Music, which guild students to explore art into their daily life.The Exploration of the development of visual art and music is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on arts in order to foster students to appreciate and apply it into lifestyles and social environment.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-美學(三)

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education： History and Literatural

description.zh: 本課程目標要使學生瞭解歷史與文化範疇的知識，以培養歷史思維與文化涵養，促進的歷史意識與文化鑑賞力。歷史與文化領域將提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文化的發展，剖析歷史與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgement with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan, China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-文史(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(一)

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1.電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2.電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3.一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4.穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5.電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。

Systems of Linear Differential Equations4.	Series Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations and Special   Functions 5.	The Laplace Transform

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 文化專題（一）課程培養同學認識臺灣不同族群的生活文化，介紹各領域與各時期的文化特色，包括：原住民各族文化、荷西鄭氏時期的多元文化、農業移墾文化、日治臺灣的近代文化、臺灣近代社會變遷、當代文藝發展與變遷、大眾文化與全球化。
description.en: This course is designed to cultivate the students' understanding of life culture from different groups in Taiwan. Students will learn the introduction of cultural feature from each areas and periods. These cultural features include the aboriginal culture, the multicultural when Taiwan is under Dutch and Spanish rule and in the Zheng period, the culture of reclaiming agriculture, the modern culture when Taiwan is under Japanese rule, the society transition of modern Taiwan, the development and transition of the modern literature and art, popular culture and globalization.

description.zh: 中國文化淵遠流長，歷數千年而不衰，涵蓋範園既廣且深。本課程授課內容，是透過物質生活(衣、食、住、行)，集體生活(社會、政治組織)，精神生活(文學、藝術、哲學、宗教信仰)等之介紹，讓學生對中國文化有更進一步的認識與了解。授課方式以口頭講授為主，討論及書面報告為輔，使得上課方式更為生動與活潑。
description.en: Chinese culture is a time-honored history, and never fades after undergoing several thousand years. The scope of Chines culture is immeasurable and deep. The contents of this course including the introduction of material life (clothing, food, housing and transportation), collective life (society, politics, and organization), and spiritual life (literature, art, philosophy and religious belief). Students will obtain further cognition and acquaintance about Chinese culture. The teaching mode is by giving students a lecture orally, and students have to discuss and hand in written reports. The teaching style is more vivacious.

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 本課程是針對有志從事文化創意產業的學生而設計的創意策略與企劃課程。課程從廣告的基本概念開始說明，如產品的開發策略、市場規模估計、競爭產品的研究和分析、消費者行為研究、SWOT、3C等。本課程的目的是以創新思考和市場行銷概念引導學生，並鼓勵學生從當前的創意產業中，發掘潛在機會，以創造新鮮且有趣的想法。
description.en: This course is a strategy and general project management for students interested in pursuing careers in the cultural and creative industry. The course starts from the basic concepts and functions in the advertising, such as the development of product strategy, market size estimation, competitor identification and analysis, consumer behavior research, SWOT, 3Cs, and so on. This course aims to guide students equipped with innovation thinking and marketing sense. Additionally, the course drives students to look through potential opportunities in the creative industry and to implement new and interesting ideas.

description.zh: 建立專業知識基礎與實務能力為教學目標，利用影像製作軟體學習數位影像製作，結合平面設計及動畫設計，學習photoshop、painter、AI軟體操作，透過課程學習影像製作與合成的各種可能性，訓練軟體操作能力，培養設計美感。
description.en: This class aims to establish professional knowledge and practical ability for learners, the use of digital video production software learning video production, combined with graphic design and animation design, learning Photoshop, Painter, and Illustrator software operations, and synthetic video production courses through various possibilities, training software ability to operate and develop the design aesthetic.

description.zh: 本課程敦請不同類屬之文化事業、創意產業之經營者，採產學協同教學模式，以實務操作和職能訓練為主要授課內容。旨在協助學生循序漸進，學習產業實務和相關應用技術，強化未來職場競爭力。
description.en: The main teaching content of this course is the practical operation and the functional training. We invite operators of cultural undertakings and the creative industries to help students learn industry practices and application of technology. This course is designed to strengthen students’ competitiveness in the future.

name.zh: 進階3D建模與文創產業4.0智能製
name.en: Advanced 3D Modeling and Culture-Innovation Industry 4.0 Intelligent Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程的設計，以文化事業的發展為目標，培訓學生動手實作能力為核心，進而建構:產品3D建模與文創產業4.0智能製造能力，培養學生未來在職場中的競爭力。本課程延續了加法加工的3D成型列印技術與減法加工的CNC 3軸加工技術，運用產業中通用專業軟體，進行:文創產品構思、設計與生產的講解。由單一的物件設計衍生為系列性的組合件產品，再經由同學間的團隊合作，完成產品的製作與生產。文創產業的BPM(Business Process Management)、APP(微型應用程式)與供應鏈之作業管理，亦是此課程的另一重心。本課程的教學模式，採用國立臺北科技大學經典的黑手工程師訓練模式，強調研發與動手並重的 OJT (On Job Training)。課堂上會有大量的實務型動手演練實作，下課後會有一定數量的 Homework與 Exercise，透過此系統性訓練課程，將使學生(學員)具備文創產業4.0實作技術與專業能力。
description.en: The design of this course, the development of cultural vocation as the goal, trains student(trainee) hands-on capacity as the core, and then construct:Product 3D modeling and culture-innovation industry 4.0 intelligent manufacturing capacity, train students to have great work capacity in the future.This course continues the 3D machining technology and subtractive machining of CNC 3-axis machining technology. Use the general software to showcase these topics: thinking of culture-innovation product, design and production. Design by a single object, to derive as a series of assembly products. And, then through the team between the students to complete the manufacturing of products.BPM (Business Process Management), APP (micro Application Software) and supply chain operations management, will be another focus of this course.The teaching mode of the course: using the TaipeiTech classic Practice Engineer Training Model, emphasizing the R&D and hands-on OJT (On Job Training) method. name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(四)

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2) 討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3) 探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異及(4) 如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外一有管理相關功能實務應用之討論與介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives:(1) to introduce a new management paradigm；(2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3) to discuss business management applications in practice and (4) to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券(股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權的投資，以及證券的評價模式和CAPM等訂價模式說明。驟。
description.en: The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security. Future option and CAPM Models.

description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system. The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided. Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-自然(一)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，配合設計實務的操作，使學生能充分了解使用者介面設計的流程以及相關的應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作的能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design, accompanying with design practice. This will allow students to understand the process of user interface design and related application, so as to be capable of practical interface design. The contents include conceptual model, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and design work.

notes: 限本系與第2專長(B)生修,上限65人

description.zh: 本課程將介紹基礎互動程式語言的架構以及設計的方法，並培養學生如何透過互動程式的設計與應用的分析及發展，實踐互動科技中有關圖像、視覺、聲音、觸感等互動效果的專案製作能力。
description.en: This course provides the fundamental knowledge, the structure and the designing methods of interactive programming. Student will learn the capability of using interactive programming design, analysis and development to implement the graphic, visual, sound, and touching interaction in interactive technology.

notes: 本系學生修課優先,上限60人

description.zh: 本課程旨在為互動媒體脈絡提供學生創意思考與企劃故事腳本，使學生瞭解互動媒體實務運作時，最前端的構思與規劃所需要的知識與技能，以及與不同領域專業的溝通表達。本課程包括一系列的腳本企劃、使用者體驗、創意呈現，以及互動媒體企劃實務案例探討。本課程之評量是以分組討論與腳本企劃報告為主。
description.en: This course is to provide the creative thinking and story-script with the context of interactive media by which students can understand the practice of interactive media, and learn the knowledge and skill for planning and creation. The contents include a series of script planning, user experience, creative representatives and the case study of interactive media. The assessment of this course depends upon the group discussion and script planning report.

notes: 媒體設計組必修&第2專長(A)修,上限60人

description.zh: 以傳授設計原理、平面及立體設計觀念、美的形式原理、平面及立體的構成練習、對各種視覺媒材特性的應用經驗以及造形與色彩的研究達到對媒體設計感覺的養成，並提高計畫性創造能力，是發展實用性及機能性以前之媒體設計訓練的基礎。
description.en: This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of two-dimension and three-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane, volume, and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied.

notes: 媒體設計組必修 (限本系學生修課)

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹互動媒體設計所需之故事腳本設計相關知識與其應用。在以使用者情境設計導向的基礎架構下，本課程的內如包含敘事性方法、創意思考方法、互動腳本企劃以及互動腳本撰寫等。修習此課程之學生可學習互動情境劇本設計之原理與實作模擬，並具備業界所需之互動媒體設計實務之企劃與分析能力。在以實務操作、課堂腦力激盪與討論的方式下，學生的評量採報告與作業的繳交以及課堂討論成績為主。
description.en: The course aims to introduce knowledge and application relevant to storytelling and script planning. Under the structure of user oriented scenario design, this course includes narrative methods, creative thinking methods, interactive script planning and writing. Students will be capable of interactive scenario script design, planning and analyzing for interactive media practice. By means of practical work, in-course brainstorming and discussion, students are evaluated by reports, assignment and course discusstion.

notes: 視覺傳達設計組必修&第2專長(B)修,上限60人

description.zh: 以傳授設計原理、平面及立體設計觀念、美的形式原理、平面及立體的構成練習、對各種視覺媒材特性的應用經驗，以及造形與色彩的研究達到對視覺設計感覺的養成，並提高計畫性創造能力，是發展實用性及機能性以前之視覺設計訓練的基礎。

notes: 視覺傳達設計組必修 (限本系學生修課)

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授動畫的企劃與設計，以及其製作原理與應用。透過對網路、動畫、遊戲、及其他數位媒體的討論，使同學了解動畫的設計製作流程、腳本撰寫、軟體應用等。
description.en: This course is focused on the introduction of animation planning and design, as well as its principle and application. Through the study on the internet, animation, game and other digital media, students can understand the design process of animation, story drafting and software application.

notes: 媒體設計組與&第2專長(A)選修,選課人數上限50人

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動遊戲設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能透過互動遊戲設計理論與產業界實務的結合對於互動遊戲設計具有全面性的了解。課程內容包含互動遊戲設計基本概念、互動理論、遊戲設計理論、互動遊戲開發工具與技術、遊戲風格與美學設計、互動遊戲設計個案研討等。課程安排包含課堂授課、個案研討、業界參訪等以加深對於互動遊戲設計實務的印象與了解。學生評量則以報告繳交與課堂小組討論為依據。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interactive game design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include theory of interaction, theory of game design, developmental tools and techniques, game styling and aesthetics and case study. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice. Students will be evaluated by reports, oral presentation and in-course group discussion.

notes: 媒體設計組與&第2專長(A)選修,選課人數上限55人
